channel.title: The Money Machine: The Online Marketing Show

item.title: Whats Next? The Detroit Revision!
item.description: http://www.tedcantu.com Http://www.1seomichigan.com Welcome to the Detroit Revision - this is a new style of marketing that is going to revolutionize and reshape Metro Detroit. It is designed to help businesses and the best part about that is it is already happening. So goodbye to the old school of marketing incliuding Yellow Pages, Direct Mail and even Television. This is a quick way to develop businesses and get them in front of the right people... Enjoy !!

item.title: Dental and Medical Marketing In the Social Media Age
item.description: http://www.1seomichigan.com Ever wonder if there are more effective ways to market your medical or dental practice? Well wonder no further... THIS IS IT! Incredible Web 2.0 strategies, and promotional ideas to help your practice succeed. We look at the kinds of websites that you should be using, discuss domain names, and look at PR strategies to help you win the search engines.

item.title: Who Else Wants To Get Paid More Than They're Worth?

item.title: Marketing Street Fighting Techniques That Work!
item.description: Ted Cantu spills his guts! He tells you what you need for creating sales, online joint ventures, dynamic sales copy and how to create customers and generate leads. Ted Cantu is an ex-art director and has been featured on many radio broadcasts and has taught many professionals in the legal, medical and marketing community. This is great stuff!

item.title: Make Your Online Fortune With Frank Julien!
item.description: Ted Cantu is joined by the legendary stock picker, Frank Julien. We break our search engine strategy format to introduce you to a phenomenal new online tool set thats getting a lot of great reviews, www.freedomroadtrading.com. Frank Julien talks about this amazing new site that actually shows you how to pick stocks, how to sell stocks, and how to beef up your portfolio and create maximum returns. This is a great system that shows the novice how to jump in the game and get a fantastic financial education. Don't miss this one.

item.title: Rethinking The Mind For Wealth
item.description: Cantu talks about REAL WEALTH CONDITIONING. We cover everything from THE SECRET, THE ATTRACTOR FACTOR, Joe Vitale and the discovery of HoPoPono. item.title: Building a Better Blog Network
item.description: We look at getting an audience through a direct marketing approach through a Blog Network. Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu shows you how to create a more substantial lead generation system through smart blogging techniques. We deconstruct a blog strategy step by step and offer advice to how you can create your own winning set up. In addition, we give SEO news, tech advice and legal advice you should know when doing blog marketing. This is straight forward information - no filler!

item.itunes:summary:
This episode hits all the bases of podcasting, rss, blogging, seo - sem, direct marketing and how to create your own information business. We clock this one in at 30 minutes.
This is no filler - just straight forward talk about how to get your campaigns off the ground and in front of the right people.

item.title: For Those About To Rank - WE SALUTE YOU !!
item.description: In this episode we talk about what makes campaigns work in direct marketing. We also look into social networks online and give you heads up on some great Internet networking events coming to your town !! Extra bonus, we pick apart a direct copy response ad and show you the details on what makes this successful. Enjoy !!
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about what makes campaigns work in direct marketing. We also look into social networks online and give you heads up on some great Internet networking events coming to your town !!
Extra bonus, we pick apart a direct copy response ad and show you the details on what makes this successful. Enjoy !!

item.title: The 12 Avenues of Influence
item.description: One is a lonely number in your marketing. If you’re just doing ONE thing to attract customers you are in a dangerous game. It is better to have four or five of these tactics working for your business. We cover the Following in this pod cast: 1. Podcast 2. Blogs 3. Postcard Marketing 4. Ads in Niche Publication 5. Affiliate Program -- this is a huge one if you do it right. 6. Cold Calling, (still the best 50-50 chance of getting in) 7. Email marketing 8. Lead generation marketing 9. Buying leads onilne 10. Buying leads from a list vendor
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary:

1. Podcast 2. Blogs 3. Postcard Marketing 4. Ads in Niche Publication 5. Affiliate Program -- this is a huge one if you do it right. 6. Cold Calling, (still the best 50-50 chance of getting in) 7. Email marketing 8. Lead generation marketing 9. Buying leads onilne 10. Buying leads from a list vendor

item.title: Sales Killers - And How To Avoid Them
item.description: Entrepreneur Magazine has rececently posted its TOP TEN SALES KILLERS list. Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu breaks down each one and combines it with real world experience from in the field. This is a worthy podcast for you to listen to if you are in sales, direct marketing, and run your own business.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: Entrepreneur Magazine has rececently posted its TOP TEN SALES KILLERS list. Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu breaks down each one and combines it with real world experience from in the field. This is a worthy podcast for you to listen to if you are in sales, direct marketing, and run your own business.

item.title: Copywriting 101
item.description: Intro to Copywriting, (salesmanship in print) and how to use it to sell your products and services. We show you how to position your sales copy for print, direct mail pieces, and on your web pages. We explore some truths and some uncommon known facts about what the experts say about copywriting. This breaks down the mysteries of writing good sales copy quick and fast.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: Intro to Copywriting, (salesmanship in print) and how to use it to sell your products and services. We show you how to position your sales copy for print, direct mail pieces, and on your web pages. We explore some truths and some uncommon known facts about what the experts say about copywriting. This breaks down the mysteries of writing good sales copy quick and fast.

item.title: Online Direct Marketing - Freeform Talk
item.description: Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu and partner Mike Stocke from Foundry Designs INC talk about online direct marketing. We cover online and offline direct marketing strategies and focus on solid copywriting. This informative show talks about what you need to do to get customers coming to your web site and how to boost profits.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu and partner Mike Stocke from Foundry Designs INC talk about online direct marketing. We cover online and offline direct marketing strategies and focus on solid copywriting. This informative show talks about what you need to do to get customers coming to your web site and how to boost profits.

item.title: The Great American Rip Off - Part II
item.description: Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu joins new partner and associate Mike Stocke from Foundry Designs INC. The two discuss onilne marketing in the midst of a MLM focussed environment. This show focusses on getting back to basics and how to develop sound strategies on how to make money online.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: Ex-Art Director Ted Cantu joins new partner and associate Mike Stocke from Foundry Designs INC. The two discuss onilne marketing in the midst of a MLM focussed environment. This show focusses on getting back to basics and how to develop sound strategies on how to make money online.

item.title: The Great American Rip Off
item.description: We look into Affiliate Programs and taking charge of your own marketing instead of relying on a Multi Level Marketing company. We weigh the pros and cons of what makes these programs work and what makes them fail. Here is what you need to know if you want to do your own onilne affiliate program and how to pick out a good server to run it on.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: We look into Affiliate Programs and taking charge of your own marketing instead of relying on a Multi Level Marketing company. We weigh the pros and cons of what makes these programs work and what makes them fail. Here is what you need to know if you want to do your own onilne affiliate program and how to pick out a good server to run it on.

item.title: Changing Face of Culture
item.description: Cultural review on the changing face of the MTV generation and visual art from the great graphic artists of the 80's- 90's. Then I go into what is the most important thing now when it comes to attracting customers or making an impact, (copywriting, online marketing, and direct marketing). I explore a range of changing heros of mine including Dan Kennedy, Seth Godin, Joe Vitale, Brett McFall and more...... I also give out a copywriitng excercise for you to try at home.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary:
Cultural review on the changing face of the MTV generation and visual art from the great graphic artists of the 80's- 90's. Then I go into what is the most important thing now when it comes to attracting customers or making an impact, (copywriting, online marketing, and direct marketing).
I explore a range of changing heros of mine including Dan Kennedy, Seth Godin, Joe Vitale, Brett McFall and more...... I also give out a copywriitng excercise for you to try at home.

item.title: Complete Web Traffic
item.description: This episode focuses on getting the most out of your web traffic. We focus on RSS, Blogging, Podcasting, RSS content feeds and creating your own RSS feeds to syndicate your own material.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary: This episode focuses on getting the most out of your web traffic. We focus on RSS, Blogging, Podcasting, RSS content feeds and creating your own RSS feeds to syndicate your own material.

item.title: SEO Tactics - Geo-Target Your Business Online
item.description: We talk about how to geo-target yourself online. We weigh the options of free and paid submissions to directories for your business. We also cover SEO copywriting as opposed to sales driven copywriting. How to index your pages using smart copywriting. How to make sure all of your web site pages get indexed.
item.dc:creator: 911 Copywriters
item.itunes:summary:
We talk about how to geo-target yourself online. We weigh the options of free and paid submissions to directories for your business.
We also cover SEO copywriting as opposed to sales driven copywriting. How to index your pages using smart copywriting. How to make sure all of your web site pages get indexed.

item.title: Hardcore Direct Marketing Podcast
item.description: Creator of www.911copywriters.com is back with his new weekly format podcast on Direct Marketing. This episode focuses on hand held devices and how to market to niche markets. We explore the new Blackjack by Cingular, Itunes, iPOD media and how to capitalize on the new mobile media trend.

item.title: The Money Machine - Online Marketing Cheat Sheet
item.description: Ted Cantu deilvers another info-packed podcast on online marketing secrets. We cover the recent YouTube.com acquisition, Viral Marketing, How To Build A Monstrous Fan Base Online and how to create an audience to buy your products.

item.title: The Money Machine: Online Marketing Cheat Sheet
item.description: Ex-Art Director from the world of advertising shares online marketing secrets. We explore how to make money online and how to get customers. Host, Ted Cantu shares market trends and online cash generating secrets for your business success.
